alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 25 at 12:33AM EST until December 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with the heaviest snow north of I-90. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Lake and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow reports from Lake County indicate that up to 4 inches of snow has already fallen since 8 pm.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
